features: Compatibility: Adjustable to fit snugly around tapered and rectangular Therm-a-Rest mattresses.
Versatile: Integrated perimeter loops mate the sheet with Therm-a-Rest quilts and blankets to create a comfortable and warm sleep system
Comfortable: Brushed polyester adds luxurious feel and breathability.
Cleanliness: Keeps mattress clean; easily removable for laundering.
